code: var key='projects';export var resetStorage=function resetStorage(){localStorage.removeItem(key);localStorage.localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify([]));};export var addProject=function addProject(project){var projects=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(key));projects.push(project);localStorage.setItem('projects',JSON.stringify(projects));};export var getProjects=function getProjects(){var projects=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(key));return projects;};
